actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to prohibit the payment of aid or assistance under approved State public assistance plans to aliens who are illegally within the United States.

summary.text: Prohibits the payment of aid or assistance by approved State public assistance plans under the Social Security Act to aliens who are illegally within the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to prohibit the payment of aid or assistance under approved State public assistance plans to aliens who are illegally within the United States.
